image.title: Faculty dressing up in cap and gown in Dabney Garden (Garden of Associates)
image.caption: Astrophysics Professor Jesse Greenstein, in the center with sunglasses. Photographer unknown.

image.sourcePath: N:\1 Digital Archives\1 HI-RES IMAGES (not cataloged)\Commencement 1965\1965_commencement_27.jpg
image.title: President Lee DuBridge (on the right) chatting with Commencement Speaker Frank Stanton
image.caption: Photographer unknown.

image.caption: Photographer unknown.

image.sourcePath: N:\1 Digital Archives\1 HI-RES IMAGES (not cataloged)\Commencement 1965\1965_commencement_24.jpg
image.title: Dr. Royal Sorenson relaxing in Dabney Garden while the faculty is robing up
image.caption: He was Professor and Chariman of the Electrical Engineering Department. Photographer unknown.

image.sourcePath: N:\1 Digital Archives\1 HI-RES IMAGES (not cataloged)\Commencement 1965\1965_commencement_5.jpg
image.title: The Caltech Band performing the prelude and processional
image.caption: Photographer unknown.

image.sourcePath: N:\1 Digital Archives\1 HI-RES IMAGES (not cataloged)\Commencement 1965\1965_commencement_3.jpg
image.caption: Photographer unknown.

image.sourcePath: N:\1 Digital Archives\1 HI-RES IMAGES (not cataloged)\Commencement 1965\1965_commencement_20.jpg
image.title: The Faculty Procession lead by Chief Marshal David S. Wood, Professor of Material Science
image.caption: Directly behind Wood, Professors Foster Strong (on the left) and Hardy Martel (on the right); in 2nd row Professor Jesse DuMond (on the right), and in 3rd row (on the left) Professor Ward Whaling. Photographer unknown.

image.sourcePath: N:\1 Digital Archives\1 HI-RES IMAGES (not cataloged)\Commencement 1965\1965_commencement_19.jpg
image.title: The Commencement speaker, Frank Stanton, marching with the Chairman of the Board of Trustees, Arnold O. Beckman
image.caption: Frank Stanton was at the time the President of CBS and Chairman of the Rand Corporation. Photographer unknown.

image.sourcePath: N:\1 Digital Archives\1 HI-RES IMAGES (not cataloged)\Commencement 1965\1965_commencement_1.jpg
image.title: Chief Marshal David S. Wood, followed by Assistant Marshals William H. Corcoran (right) and Rodman W. Paul (left)
image.caption: In the background, center, can be seen the cupola of Throop Hall of Administration. Photographer unknown.

image.sourcePath: N:\1 Digital Archives\1 HI-RES IMAGES (not cataloged)\Commencement 1965\1965_commencement_2.jpg
image.title: Frank Stanton giving the Commencement address
image.caption: Photo Credit: James McClanahan.
